text: Ramón Valdés Chávez (born 31 August 1942) is a Mexican politician from the Citizens' Movement. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the State of Mexico. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from the State of Mexico Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Citizens' Movement (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: Ramón Valdés Chávez
